translation.en: [man] Me too. I've never seen him this upset.
translation.zh: ‎我也是 我从没见他这么生气过

translation.en: -[woman] I know. -[man] He's taking it hard.
[woman] You know what he said to me?
He said he'll never write another story ever again.
translation.zh: ‎他说他不会再写别的故事了

translation.en: I'm gonna burn all this stupid stuff!
[woman] I'm so afraid that tonight is gonna, like, stifle him
translation.zh: ‎（《捉鬼小灵精》） ‎我很怕今晚会把他扼杀

translation.en: or be this wound that haunts him.
translation.zh: ‎或留下不可磨灭的精神创伤

translation.en: but maybe we let his obsession with horror get out of hand.
translation.zh:
‎他是个很有创意的孩子 ‎但他沉迷恐怖故事
‎也许我们太放纵他了

translation.en: [man] I guess I can see how they could consider it a little weird.
translation.zh: ‎我能理解他们为何会觉得这样有点怪

translation.en: Maybe it would be easier if he was just more, I don't know, normal.
translation.zh:
‎如果他更正常一点
‎也许事情会轻松一些

translation.en: [man 1 on TV] It was all gonna be so perfect, Lucy…
translation.zh: ‎一切原本会非常完美 露茜…

translation.en: [man 1 on TV] …just like one big, happy family.
[boy on TV] Great. The bloodsucking Brady Bunch.
[man 1 on TV] I haven't changed my mind about that.
[man 2 on TV] I didn't invite you this time, Max. [Lucy] Michael.
translation.zh:
‎-我这次没有邀请你 麦克斯
‎-是迈克尔

translation.en: -[boy] Don't you touch my mother! -[Lucy] Sam, don't! No, Sam!
translation.zh:
‎-别碰我妈妈！
‎-山姆 不要！ ‎不 山姆！

translation.en: Let's get this over with. I'm a busy witch.
translation.zh: ‎我们解决这事 我是忙碌女巫

translation.en: Are you useful in any way?
they were not useful to me.
Is there anything special about you at all?
Any reason I should let you live?
translation.zh: ‎我有什么理由让你活下去吗？

translation.en: My Nightbooks. It's where I wrote my stories.
translation.zh: ‎我的夜书 我写的故事都在里面

translation.en: What are you doing with these so late at night?
translation.zh: ‎这么晚了 你拿着它做什么？

translation.en: I was gonna burn them in the boiler room downstairs.
translation.zh: ‎我本来要去楼下的锅炉房烧掉它

translation.en: Burn them? So they're not any good.
They're good. They're very, really, really good.
The title better not be the scariest thing about them.
translation.zh: ‎内容最好要比这书名要恐怖

translation.en: I'm going to need a story every night.
The story better be good, and it better be scary,
or it's the last thing you'll ever do. [giggles]
How'd you get in here? -[hissing] -[Alex screaming]
[Alex] And where'd the front door go?
-[Alex] You're a kid. -[girl] And you're a genius.
translation.zh:
‎-你是个小孩
‎-这都被你看出来了

translation.en: Anything in these cabinets is off-limits.
translation.zh: ‎这些柜子里的任何东西都不能碰

translation.en: Don't ever think Natacha won't miss this piece of popcorn.
translation.zh:
‎别以为娜塔莎不会注意
‎少了一粒爆米花

translation.en: You say cat. I say Natacha's little spy-beast.
translation.zh: ‎你叫它猫 我叫它娜塔莎的小奸细

translation.en: Keep up. Natacha is the witch.
translation.zh: ‎跟上节奏 娜塔莎就是那个女巫

translation.en: Lenore is that wrinkled, hairless thing that follows you around all day,
translation.zh:
‎莱诺尔就是那只无毛皱巴巴的东西
‎整天跟着你

translation.en: She ratted me out over a stinking cup of noodles.
translation.zh: ‎她曾经为了一杯泡面就出卖我

translation.en: Don't just stand there. Help me clean this up before Natacha gets home.
translation.zh:
‎别傻站着不动
‎帮我清理干净 免得娜塔莎回家看到

translation.en: I don't know where she goes or what she does,
translation.zh: ‎我不知道她去了哪里或做些什么

translation.en: but she can go anywhere she wants.
Talk about the ultimate passport, this apartment is it.
translation.zh: ‎这公寓就像是一份终极护照

translation.en: Come on. We both have work to do. I'll get you set up.
translation.zh: ‎来吧 我们都有事要做 我帮你布置好

translation.en: The apartment travels all over the world, luring kids in.
translation.zh: ‎这公寓环游世界 吸引小孩子进来

translation.en: I live in Washington. Washington, DC.
translation.zh: ‎我住在华盛顿 华盛顿特区

translation.en: I wonder if we're still in Brooklyn.
translation.zh: ‎不知道我们是否还在布鲁克林

translation.en: The apartment can do two things.
It lures suckers like us in,
and it has room to hold…
The Empty Classroom and Other Creepy Stories.
I thought you said you weren't into that kinda stuff anymore.
translation.zh: ‎你不是说你已经不喜欢这些东西了吗

translation.en: -I'm not. It's my friend. -Oh, it's your friend?
translation.zh:
‎-不是我 而是我朋友
‎-你朋友？

translation.en: He, uh… he'd like all this stuff.
-He's, like… he's really lame. -Yeah, he sounds lame.
translation.zh:
‎-他…他很没趣
‎-对 听起来就很没趣

translation.en: So she makes me read her a stupid scary story every night,
translation.zh: ‎好了 每天晚上 ‎她都让我给她读一个恐怖故事

translation.en: but she says everything in here's already been read.
translation.zh: ‎但她说这里所有东西都已经读过了

translation.en: She needs you, so get to work.
You heard her. She wants a scary story tonight.
translation.zh:
‎你听到她的话了
‎她今晚要听一个恐怖故事

translation.en: Every day, write as many stories as you can.
translation.zh: ‎每天你都写尽可能多的故事

translation.en: I don't write-- Cut the crap.
I heard you last night, talking about your Nightbook thingies.
translation.zh: ‎我昨晚听到你说你的夜书什么的

translation.en: I'm over the whole writing thing.
Then you better get over getting over it and crank out some new tales,
translation.zh: ‎那你最好重新提起笔来 ‎编一些新的故事出来 否则…
‎编一些新的故事出来 否则…

translation.en: You'll be lucky if she kills you.
Forget your family. Forget your friends. Focus on being useful to Natacha.
translation.zh: ‎忘了你的家人 忘了你的朋友 ‎集中精力让娜塔莎觉得你有用

translation.en: Hmm. Were you purposely making me wait?
-No. I… I was doing the dishes. -Sit there.
translation.zh:
‎-不是 我刚刚在洗碗
‎-坐下

translation.en: Give me a minute to get settled.
Do you know what happens to children who ask too many questions?
translation.zh:
‎小孩子问太多问题
‎你知道有什么下场吗？

translation.en: Yasmin, too, had a little rebellious streak.
But I am curious about one thing.
translation.zh: ‎不过 有一件事我很好奇

translation.en: [Alex] "When… when Todd's best friend Jenny died,
translation.zh: ‎“托德最好的朋友珍妮去世时

translation.en: his heart shattered into a thousand pieces."
Shattered heart? I like it already.
translation.zh: ‎千刀万剐？我已经喜欢这故事了

translation.en: [Alex] "Everyone avoided the Foster Playground at night."
translation.zh: ‎“大家在夜里都会避开福斯特游乐场”

translation.en: "In the hour before daylight, the dead kids would come out and play."
translation.zh: ‎“日出前一小时 儿童怨灵会出来…”

translation.en: Nope. No, no, no. Sorry, nope.
translation.zh: ‎不行 不好意思 不行

translation.en: Everyone knows that ghosts haunt places that are personal to them,
translation.zh:
‎人人都知道
‎鬼魂只会出现在有私人感情的地方

translation.en: [Alex] "Todd walks to the playground. He gets to the gate."
translation.zh: ‎“托德走到游乐场 他到了门口”

translation.en: "And as soon as his foot crosses the threshold,
"Suddenly, a boy shoots out of the slide."
translation.zh: ‎“突然 滑梯里走出了一个男孩”

translation.en: "Maybe he's ten or so, dressed like a newsie from the '20s."
translation.zh:
‎“大概十岁的样子
‎打扮得像1920年代的报童”

translation.en: Rude. You could at least say hi.
translation.zh: ‎没礼貌 至少要打个招呼吧

translation.en: I… I mean… I mean hi.
I'm looking for my friend, Jenny.
[Alex] "…Todd says, while looking for any sign of her."
translation.zh:
‎“托德一边说
‎一边在游乐场搜寻她的踪迹”

translation.en: To find her, you have to play.
translation.zh: ‎要找到她 你必须玩游戏

translation.en: [Alex] "The newsie whistles, and half a dozen dead kids surround Todd."
translation.zh: ‎“报童吹了声口哨 ‎六个儿童怨灵围住了托德”

translation.en: "Their skin is deathly white. Some of their clothes date back decades."
translation.zh: ‎“他们的皮肤死白死白” ‎“有些穿着几十年前的服装”

translation.en: "They push Todd on a swing, higher and higher--"
translation.zh: ‎“他们让托德坐到秋千上 越推越高”

translation.en: Everyone knows ghosts don't have actual physical hands,
translation.zh: ‎大家都知道鬼没有真正的手

translation.en: so they could never push him on a swing.
The playground is… it's an interdimensional plane,
a mix between the spirit world and the real world.
Oh, so you're a quantum physicist now?
and they pull Todd to a rusty merry-go-round."
translation.zh: ‎把托德拉到生锈的旋转木马上”

translation.en: "They spin him around and around, faster and faster,
"Then the ghosts force Todd onto a seesaw."
translation.zh: ‎“然后怨灵强迫托德坐到跷跷板上”

translation.en: "Suddenly, Todd realizes what they're up to."
translation.zh: ‎“突然 托德意识到了他们的目的”

translation.en: "Any living child still on the playground when the sun rises
translation.zh:
‎“太阳升起时
‎如果有活人孩子依然在游乐场

translation.en: is cursed to remain there forever."
translation.zh: ‎那就会受到诅咒 永远留下”

translation.en: "He stumbles towards the gate, desperate to get out,
translation.zh:
‎“他跌跌撞撞地冲向大门
‎急切地想走出去

translation.en: but his world is spinning, and he's tripping over his own feet."
translation.zh: ‎但他的世界天旋地转 他摔倒在地”

translation.en: "The sun's almost up. He's nearly out of time."
translation.zh: ‎“太阳快升起来了 他快没时间了”

translation.en: "All the ghost children watch in suspense."
"Until suddenly, someone grabs him and pulls him towards the exit."
translation.zh: ‎“但突然有人抓住他 把他拽到出口”

translation.en: "'Jenny, I… I wanted to see you.'"
not stopping for a happy reunion."
"Seeing his old friend again makes Todd's heart hurt."
translation.zh: ‎“再次见到老朋友 这让托德心痛”

translation.en: I miss you. I don't wanna let you go.
translation.zh: ‎我想你 我不想对你放手

translation.en: [Alex] "But in death, Jenny discovered something that Todd is about to learn."
translation.zh:
‎“但死后的珍妮有所顿悟
‎托德也即将知道这一点”
‎朋友永远不会放手 托德

translation.en: -[meows] -[distorted] Are you out of your mind?
Jenny… Jenny's dead. She's… she's trapped on the playground forever.
translation.zh: ‎珍妮死了 永世都困在游乐场里

translation.en: -It's not happy for her. -[Natacha breathing heavily]
[spluttering] Ghostly hands go on Todd's back.
He… he… he glances behind him,
and he's pulled into the playground.
He… he screams for help, but it's no use.
translation.zh: ‎他大声喊救命 但是没用

translation.en: His ghostly soul is trapped there to this very day.
translation.zh: ‎时至今日 他的鬼魂依然困在游乐场

translation.en: [breathlessly] Happy endings are a dangerous thing.
Did you at least like the story? I mean, until the ending?
translation.zh:
‎你还是喜欢这个故事的吧？
‎撇开结局？
‎我猜不透你 讲故事的人

translation.en: This beautiful darkness dances inside your brain.
translation.zh: ‎这份美丽的黑暗 ‎在你的脑海里舞动

translation.en: [sighs] I… I wanna be like everyone else.
Uh, I had… I had trouble writing today.
It's just hard to concentrate with someone staring at me all day.
translation.zh: ‎整天被人盯着 我很难集中注意力

translation.en: I told you, show him the library and then get out.
translation.zh:
‎我嘱咐过
‎带他去图书馆之后 你就离开

translation.en: -[meows] -It is very important that he writes.
You know how important it is.
It… it wasn't her fault either.
Well, if it wasn't Yasmin's fault, and it wasn't Lenore's fault,
translation.zh: ‎既不是亚丝敏 也不是莱诺尔
‎是我的错 我会写得更快
‎别再找借口 讲故事的人

translation.en: I wasn't trying to get you in any kind of trouble.
Yasmin, I'm sorry. I didn't know about the "no happy endings" thing.
translation.zh: ‎亚丝敏 对不起 ‎我之前并不知道不可以写圆满结局

translation.en: Todd shouldn't have gone back for Jenny.
He was her friend, and that's what friends do.
translation.zh: ‎他们是朋友 朋友就该那样做

translation.en: But in here? She's right, you know.
She wants stories? Fine. I'll give her some stories.
translation.zh:
‎她想听故事？
‎行吧 那我就给她讲故事

translation.en: Haunted by the spirit of somebody who died working at it.
translation.zh: ‎怨灵生前在桌边工作 死在桌边

translation.en: No, no, it's stupid. They're gonna think it's stupid.
translation.zh: ‎不 太蠢了 他们会觉得很蠢

translation.en: How long you been here for?
They got me with a piece of pie and Lost Boys.
translation.zh:
‎他们用一块馅饼和《捉鬼小灵精》
‎骗到了我

translation.en: Alex stared up at the ceiling.
Then the ceiling fell on him
and put him out of his misery.
It's the oldest book in here.
This thing's gotta be, like, a thousand years old.
translation.zh: ‎这东西一定有一千年的历史了

translation.en: "If I don't make it out of here, I need someone to know what happened,
translation.zh:
‎“如果我无法离开这里
‎那也要让人知道发生了什么

translation.en: even if it's only the characters in these books."
"People said they didn't exist, but there it was."
translation.zh:
‎“大家说不存在独角兽
‎但我看到它了”

translation.en: "I followed it into this apartment, and now I'm trapped by a witch."
translation.zh:
‎“我跟着它进了公寓
‎现在被一个女巫困住了”

translation.en: "I just have to do what the witch tells me to
translation.zh: ‎“我只需要按女巫的指示去做

translation.en: until Mom and Dad find me."
"There are other kids here. Most of them are nice."
translation.zh:
‎“这里还有其他孩子
‎大部分都很友好”

translation.en: "I'm scared, but at least I'm not alone."
translation.zh: ‎“我很害怕 但至少我不是独自一人”
‎是哦 我看着就喜欢独角兽

translation.en: Oh, I thought maybe that's how she got you.
translation.zh: ‎我以为她就是这样骗你进来的

translation.en: You're right. It's none of my business.
And I bet you weren't lured in by a stupid movie and a piece of pie.
translation.zh:
‎而且你肯定不是
‎被一部愚蠢电影和一块馅饼骗进来

translation.en: What the hell is doro wat?
Chicken, onions caramelized in spiced butter, paprika, garlic,
translation.zh: ‎炖鸡肉 加上黄油焦糖洋葱、辣椒粉 ‎大蒜、姜、埃塞俄比亚混合辣椒粉
‎大蒜、姜、埃塞俄比亚混合辣椒粉

translation.en: My grandmother and I used to make it before she died.
translation.zh: ‎我祖母去世前 我和她经常做这道菜

translation.en: We even grew all the herbs and veggies ourselves.
translation.zh: ‎所有草料和蔬菜都是我们自己种的
‎话说回来 当时我闻到“沃特”

translation.en: and I just so badly wanted to see my āyatē again.
How's that for a happy ending?

translation.zh: ‎“长出了尖牙 饥饿感也有了

translation.en: and Katie discovered that her hunch was right."
"To a vampire, blood does taste like candy."
translation.zh:
‎“对吸血鬼来说
‎血液的味道就像糖果”

translation.en: Everybody knows it takes two days to grow full fangs.
translation.zh:
‎大家都知道
‎尖牙完全长出来需要两天
‎来吧 莱诺尔 跟你讲和

translation.en: There's gotta be more writing from that Unicorn Girl.
translation.zh: ‎那个独角兽女孩一定写了更多东西

translation.en: "…but it's too late. The roller coaster plunges down the drop."
translation.zh: ‎“但为时已晚 过山车直直掉了下去”
‎“但为时已晚 过山车直直掉了下去” ‎“钢铁断裂 金属巨响…

translation.en: and the grim reaper's dog laughs at the carnage."
translation.zh: ‎死神的狗笑着看着这场大屠杀”

translation.en: The grim reaper doesn't have a pet.
"They saw their son's footprints in the snow, leading into the woods."
translation.zh:
‎“他们看到
‎儿子在雪地里的脚印通往林地”

translation.en: "Then they saw a pair of smaller footprints,
translation.zh: ‎“然后他们看到了一对更小的脚印

translation.en: "And they never saw their precious son again."
translation.zh: ‎之后 他们再也没见到宝贝儿子”

translation.en: Took me right out of the story.
Every good story hints at truth.
translation.zh: ‎每一个好故事都隐含着事实

translation.en: The more truth, the more powerful the story.
translation.zh: ‎事实越多 故事就越有力量

translation.en: From now on, get your facts straight.
translation.zh: ‎从今以后 好好弄清楚事实吧

translation.en: "I don't know how long I've been here."
"I still have the necklace Mom and Dad gave me."
translation.zh: ‎“我还有爸爸妈妈给我的项链”

translation.en: "I used to touch it to remember them,
translation.zh: ‎“我以前常常触摸项链 回忆他们

translation.en: "I have what I need to escape tonight."
"I'm finally going to see them again, Mom and Dad."
"I wonder if they'll even know me."
You did not just throw a book at me!
Uh, no. You just surprised me. I dropped it.
translation.zh: ‎不是的 你吓到我了 我失手把书掉了

translation.en: Hey, Yasmin, wait until you see what I found.
translation.zh: ‎亚丝敏 你看我发现了什么

translation.en: Yeah. Sunlight is bad for magical plants.
translation.zh: ‎对 阳光不利于魔法植物

translation.en: Enough questions. Help me with this.
I watered the vine with rat's blood instead of bat's blood.
translation.zh:
‎我没用蝙蝠血来浇藤蔓
‎而是用了老鼠血

translation.en: Now, Shredder eggs are growing on it. If one of them hatches,
translation.zh:
‎上面长了撕裂蜘蛛卵 ‎一个卵孵化出来
‎就能毁了暗夜苗圃

translation.en: it can destroy the night nursery, and Natacha will kill me.
translation.zh:
‎一个卵孵化出来
‎就能毁了暗夜苗圃 ‎娜塔莎肯定会杀了我

translation.en: -[Yasmin] I'm taking care of it, Lenore. -[meows]
[whispering] Okay. Put it gently on the ground.
Stomp it as hard as you can.
[Alex] Where's the blue mist come from? Do you make it?
translation.zh: ‎蓝色喷雾是哪里来的？你做的吗？

translation.en: The mist, do you think it keeps Natacha young?
I mean, she's really pretty, but her books are ancient,
translation.zh: ‎她确实很漂亮 但她的书都很老

translation.en: and the apartment looks like a granny decorated it.
translation.zh: ‎而且公寓打扮是老奶奶风格

translation.en: I thought for sure it was gonna--
It's cutting down the Shredder eggs! Stomp on them!
translation.zh: ‎它在切断撕裂蜘蛛卵！快用脚跺！
‎全部撕裂蜘蛛卵都在这里了

translation.en: [Yasmin] There it is! Don't let it get away!
We need to find it and kill it before it destroys the whole place.
translation.zh:
‎我们得找到它 除掉它
‎免得它毁掉这整个地方

translation.en: I'm okay. I'm okay. I'm okay.
I don't know where it went. [breathes shakily]
Now let's get out of here.
You've been misbehaving in my garden.
This will hurt you far more than it hurts me. [chuckles]
Do try to keep your eyes open.
I would hate to have to start over.
[distorted] Can't you do anything right? I said keep your eyes open!
translation.zh:
‎你真是什么事都办不好
‎我叫你睁大眼睛！

translation.en: I begged Yasmin to take me to the nursery.
I thought the creepy plants might help me think of something cool to write about.
translation.zh:
‎我心想那些怪异的植物
‎也许给我一些好的写作灵感

translation.en: She made me promise not to touch anything, but I did.
translation.zh:
‎她让我保证不碰任何东西
‎但我还是碰了

translation.en: That is very brave of you, Storyteller,
to lie right to my face.
If I didn't need you to clean up the mess, I would've.
translation.zh:
‎要不是需要你来清理烂摊子
‎你就死定了

translation.en: I'm sorry I got you involved.
From now on, you help yourself. I'll help myself.
translation.zh: ‎从今以后 你顾你自己 我顾我自己

translation.en: [spluttering] Yas, we can get out of here, together.
translation.zh: ‎亚丝 我们可以一起离开这里

translation.en: Get… get off me! Get off me! Get off!
No! No! No! No! No! No! No!
-You've been here all night? -Yeah, all night. [sighs]
translation.zh:
‎-你整晚都在这里？
‎-对 通宵

translation.en: I made this. It'll help with the scrapes and cuts.
translation.zh: ‎这是我做的 有助于治疗擦伤和割伤

translation.en: It's a kind of aloe from a harpy plant, some dried corpse-hair vine.
translation.zh:
‎哈比植物的萃取液
‎还有些风干的毛发藤蔓

translation.en: Look what Yas made for us.
I… I… I don't have any stories.
What do you mean you don't have any? You said you had a bunch of them.
translation.zh:
‎什么叫一个都没有？
‎你说过你有一堆故事

translation.en: I did, but a Shredder, it got into my room.
translation.zh: ‎没错 但一只撕裂蜘蛛进了我房间

translation.en: And I killed it, but it destroyed all of my Nightbooks,
translation.zh: ‎我杀了它 但它毁了我的夜书

translation.en: I was reading to Natacha from those Nightbooks.
translation.zh: ‎我之前都在给娜塔莎读夜书里的故事

translation.en: I've got nothing now. I… I have to escape. I have no choice!
translation.zh:
‎现在我什么都没有
‎我必须逃走 别无选择！

translation.en: There are two ways out. The front door where you came in and the back door--
translation.zh:
‎出路有两条
‎一是你进来时的前门 二是后门…

translation.en: The back door! It goes outside. I saw Natacha go through there. There's--
translation.zh: ‎后门！它通往外界 ‎我见过娜塔莎走出那扇门

translation.en: But Natacha's the only one that has the keys to that door.
translation.zh: ‎但只有娜塔莎有那扇门的钥匙

translation.en: You need to get over this escape nonsense and write something.
translation.zh:
‎你得忘掉逃跑的无稽之谈
‎写一点东西出来

translation.en: -I'll be useless to her. She'll kill me. -She won't just kill you.
translation.zh:
‎-到时候我别无用处 她会杀了我
‎-她不会只是杀了你

translation.en: Hwan was too young, but the rest of us took turns reading to Natacha.
translation.zh:
‎小黄年纪太小
‎我们其他三人轮流给娜塔莎读故事

translation.en: Afterwards, we'd all huddle together at night
translation.zh: ‎之后 我们晚上会抱在一起…

translation.en: Last night, I almost joined them.
translation.zh: ‎昨晚我差点变成他们的一员

translation.en: One day, the kitchen sink got clogged.
translation.zh: ‎有一天 厨房水槽被堵住了

translation.en: That's because I blocked the pipe myself with starstell moss.
translation.zh:
‎那是因为
‎我亲手用星状苔藓堵住了管道

translation.en: [crying] I wanted to force Natacha to call the plumber.
I taped a note under the sink for him to find,
translation.zh: ‎我在水槽下面贴了一张纸条

translation.en: Natacha found the note, didn't she?
translation.zh: ‎娜塔莎找到了纸条 是吧？

translation.en: Claire spent her last moments convincing Natacha that she did it…
translation.zh:
‎克莱尔生前最后时刻
‎是在说服娜塔莎 事情是她做的

translation.en: [breathes shakily] I used to love writing scary stories,
but then I decided to stop.
And now that I have to write…
the… the ideas won't come to me anymore.
[Yasmin] Yeah. A big, blue plastic one. Why?
translation.zh: ‎对 大大的蓝色塑料手表 怎么了？

translation.en: -And Claire, those earrings? -[Yasmin] They were her aunt's.
translation.zh: ‎克莱尔戴着那些耳环？ ‎那是她姨妈的耳环

translation.en: There's a way out of this place.
-"I have what I need to escape tonight." -"Escape," Yasmin.
translation.zh:
‎-“今晚逃跑的条件已经成熟”
‎-“逃跑” 亚丝敏

translation.en: "I'm finally gonna see them again, Mom and Dad."
Unicorn Girl never took this off,
and none of the kids in the cabinet are wearing it.
translation.zh: ‎但柜子里的孩子没人戴着它

translation.en: You're right. And if she's not in the cabinet, then--
translation.zh: ‎没错 既然她不在柜子里 那么…

‎她成功了 ‎她逃走了
‎我一直在拼凑她留下的文字

translation.en: I've been piecing together her notes. There are bits here and there.
translation.zh:
‎她逃走了
‎我一直在拼凑她留下的文字 ‎非常零碎

translation.en: She hid them throughout the books, so in case Natacha found out--
translation.zh:
‎她把文字分散在所有书里
‎就算娜塔莎发现…

translation.en: She wouldn't know her full plan.
Your plan sucks. We're not gonna find this today.
translation.zh: ‎你的计划很烂 我们今天肯定找不到

translation.en: You need to write a story for tonight.
It'd take, like, a thousand years to search all these books.
translation.zh: ‎把这些书全找一遍需要一千年吧

translation.en: The pen marks in the old book!
Is this the original "Hansel and Gretel"?
No one would just eat candy off of a strange house.
translation.zh: ‎没人会吃奇怪房子掉落的糖果

translation.en: [gasps] I was right! More writing! [Yasmin] It's a recipe for a sleeping potion.
translation.zh:
‎-我猜对了！有更多字！
‎-这是安眠药水的配方

translation.en: "I need to figure out how to hide the stink so she'll drink it."
translation.zh: ‎“我得想办法掩盖臭味 让她喝下去”

translation.en: "I'm so close. I'll put her to sleep and steal her keys."
translation.zh:
‎“我就快成功了
‎我会让她睡着 偷走她的钥匙”

translation.en: "I'd turn her into a toad or a snail and laugh at her all day long."
translation.zh:
‎“那样我会把她变成蛤蟆或蜗牛
‎然后整天嘲笑她”

translation.en: "Then I would turn her into a centipede and rip off her legs."
translation.zh:
‎“然后我会把她变成蜈蚣
‎然后扯断她的腿”

translation.en: I'll keep looking. You have to write a story.
translation.zh: ‎我继续找 你得写个故事

translation.en: You're the only one who can. You've gotta buy us more time.
translation.zh:
‎只有你能写故事
‎你得给我们争取更多时间

translation.en: I like to write scary stories?
Well, they're right. You are weird.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 他们说得对 你是怪人

translation.en: But the thing that makes you weird makes them ordinary.
translation.zh: ‎但你的“怪”反衬出了他们的平凡

translation.en: And no one likes to be ordinary. Ordinary sucks.
translation.zh:
‎没有人喜欢做个平凡人
‎平平无奇很没劲

translation.en: So ordinary people are gonna try and take that away from you…
translation.zh:
‎于是平凡人会想要
‎从你身上夺走你的不平凡

translation.en: How did she mask the smell?
[Yasmin] The only other person who would know is Natacha,
translation.zh: ‎唯一可能知道的人是娜塔莎

translation.en: but she would never tell us.
I could write a story to trick her into giving us
the final ingredient of the sleeping potion.
translation.zh: ‎骗她说出安眠药水的最后一种原料

translation.en: [Yasmin] You know what happens if she figures out what we're up to?
translation.zh:
‎如果她弄明白我们的企图
‎你知道我们的下场吧？

translation.en: [Alex] I know what happens if we don't try. [Yasmin] What's the name of the story?
translation.zh:
‎-我知道如果我们不努力会怎样
‎-故事叫什么名字？

translation.en: I want a story that'll make you squirm.
translation.zh: ‎我想听一个让你紧张的故事

translation.en: You thought I forgot about that, didn't you?
translation.zh: ‎你以为我忘了这件事 对吧？

translation.en: I was… I just… I was… [sighs]
I'm so sorry. I'm so stupid.
Yes, you are. I've only been saying that for years.
translation.zh: ‎是的 你很笨 我多年来一直这么说

translation.en: You were about to tell me to start reading.
Oh yes. Well then, what are you waiting for?
[Alex] "For generations, the evil sorcerer of Quantel
translation.zh:
‎“宽特尔的邪恶巫师
‎让一代又一代的孩子

translation.en: sent children to mine jewels from the mouth of the great monster."
[Alex] "A thousand years ago, the evil sorcerer had a chance to kill the odious beast,
translation.zh:
‎“‎一千年前 邪恶巫师本可铲除
‎这头面目可憎的巨兽

translation.en: but instead he used a powerful potion to keep the monster unconscious,
translation.zh: ‎但他却用强力药水令怪兽沉睡

translation.en: [Alex] "Every morning, the sorcerer funneled his potion
translation.zh: ‎“每天早上 巫师会把药水

translation.en: "The recipe was as old as time."
"But the most important ingredient, however, was bindweed."
translation.zh: ‎“不过 最重要的原料 ‎就是旋花”

translation.en: that could hide the powerful stench of the potion."
"Without it, the rancid smell would rouse the great monster."
translation.zh: ‎“否则 令人作呕的恶臭将惊醒巨兽”

translation.en: "But one day, the sorcerer went to harvest more bindweed,
and he discovered that the entire field had withered and died."
translation.zh: ‎却发现整片旋花都已经枯萎死亡”
‎“臭不可闻、臭气熏天、其臭无比…”

translation.en: Oh, yes, yes, yes. Understood. It stinks.
translation.zh: ‎行了 明白了 非常臭

translation.en: [Alex] "The sorcerer would have to kill the great monster once and for all."
"He reluctantly raised his mighty staff to kill the beast,
translation.zh: ‎“他不情愿地拿起魔杖 准备杀死巨兽

translation.en: but a peasant girl came to him and promised a solution to his problem."
translation.zh:
‎但一位农家女向他走来
‎保证可以解决他的问题”

translation.en: I know a replacement for bindweed. Your jewel harvest can continue.
translation.zh:
‎我知道旋花的替代品
‎你可以继续采集珠宝

translation.en: Foolish child. You know nothing of real magic.
translation.zh: ‎蠢孩子 你对真正的魔法一无所知

translation.en: I can prove it. And if I do, I want a bag of jewels.
translation.zh:
‎我可以证明
‎如果成功 我想要一袋珠宝

translation.en: If it works, you will get two bags.
translation.zh: ‎如果成功 你会拿到两袋珠宝

translation.en: If not, you will give me your life.
and poured a mysterious dark liquid into the jug."
"The smell disappeared. The sorcerer couldn't believe it."
translation.zh: ‎“臭味消失了！” ‎“巫师简直不敢相信”

translation.en: "It smelled like daisies, roses, lilacs on a spring morning--"
translation.zh:
‎“闻起来就像
‎春日清晨的雏菊、月季、丁香…”

translation.en: [Alex] "The evil sorcerer poured the potion into the monster's ear and waited."
translation.zh:
‎“邪恶巫师把药水倒入巨兽的耳朵
‎然后等待着”

translation.en: "The beast let out a long… [in low voice] …grumble
translation.zh: ‎“巨兽发出了一声长长的嘟哝声

translation.en: "Yes! But the peasant girl had removed more than just the smell from the potion."
translation.zh:
‎“太好了！” ‎“但农家女去掉的
‎不仅只是药水的臭味”

translation.en: "She'd also erased all of its magic."
"The peasant girl nodded to something behind him."
translation.zh:
‎“农家女朝他背后的什么东西
‎点了点头”

translation.en: [Alex] "The eyes of the great monster were open."
[Alex] "The peasant girl watched it all, smiling."
"The evil sorcerer had sent her baby brother into that cave,
translation.zh: ‎“邪恶无视曾把她弟弟送入洞穴

translation.en: "The peasant girl cared nothing about jewels."

translation.zh: ‎“她想要复仇 而且成功了”
‎“于是她慢步走开 而巨兽的尖牙

translation.en: as the monster's sharp teeth chomped down on the shrieking sorcerer,
translation.zh: ‎“于是她慢步走开 而巨兽的尖牙 ‎咀嚼着尖叫的巫师

translation.en: "Just as the peasant girl thought she'd gotten away with it all,
a black shadow loomed over her."
"It was the monster's giant foot, right above her."
Yeah, me and Yasmin researched for hours.
translation.zh: ‎对 我和亚丝敏研究了几个小时

translation.en: I know how important it is to get all the details right--
Of course I made up the potion's ingredients,
translation.zh: ‎当然 药水的原料都是编的

translation.en: but I was sure that bindweed hides odors.
translation.zh: ‎不过我很确定旋花能掩盖臭味

translation.en: -I really thought we got it right. -Well, there's your mistake.
translation.zh:
‎-我真以为我们写对了
‎-错就错在这里
‎大家都知道 肉桂草掩盖气味

translation.en: Is that cinaroot with an "S" or a "C"?
Tonight, we're getting out of here.
It's turning green. I can't bring this out there.
translation.zh: ‎它变成绿色了 我不能拿它出去

translation.en: Maybe the acidity of the lemonade-- The service here is terrible. [sighs]
translation.zh:
‎-也许柠檬水的酸度…
‎-这里的服务真差

translation.en: We put two drops in the glass.
translation.zh:
‎我们在杯子里倒了两滴
‎在壶里也倒两滴

translation.en: -Let's put two in the pitcher. -Will it put her to sleep?
translation.zh:
‎我们在杯子里倒了两滴
‎在壶里也倒两滴 ‎能让她睡吗？

translation.en: What? I put it right here.
-Where is it? -What are you talking about?
Where is the potion? This has to happen.
Yeah, yeah. It's, uh… it's here somewhere.
So, um, this one is, um, called "The Cuckoo Clock."
[Alex] When Scott's parents bought the cuckoo clock at an estate sale,
translation.zh:
‎斯科特的父母在房地产拍卖会上
‎买了一个布谷鸟钟

translation.en: he thought it was just another old-timey piece of junk.
translation.zh: ‎他原本以为那只是一个老旧的破玩意

translation.en: But there was something strange about the clock.
the little cuckoo would pop out,
and, uh, Steve started to notice--
I thought you said his name was Scott.
So… so Scott noticed that, uh, the cuckoo
seemed to look a little bit different every time it appeared.
translation.zh: ‎布谷鸟每次出现看起来都有点不同

translation.en: the ones that you're supposed to be writing every day?
translation.zh: ‎你每天不是都应该写故事吗？

translation.en: -I'm sorry. I'm sorry. -Where are your new stories?
The Shredder, it got into my backpack.
[spluttering] Uh, it's true. It escaped from the night nursery.
translation.zh: ‎真的 它从暗夜苗圃逃了出来

translation.en: I'll make you the recipe. I--
Please. You can barely follow a recipe.
translation.zh: ‎少来了 你连照着食谱做都不会

translation.en: He writes for you! You need him! [spluttering] I'll write the best story for you!
translation.zh:
‎-他给你写故事！你需要他！
‎-我会给你写最好的故事！

translation.en: [Alex] Oh no. What's wrong with you?
Poor little thing. What happened to you?
translation.zh: ‎可怜的小东西 你怎么了？

translation.en: Lenore put our potion in the bottle of mist.
translation.zh: ‎莱诺尔把药水倒进了喷雾瓶里

translation.en: She must've gotten a dose of the sleeping potion.

translation.zh:
‎-谢谢你 莱诺尔
‎-亚历克斯 我们成功了

translation.en: How's that for following a recipe?
Wait. Where do you think it goes?
translation.zh: ‎等等 你觉得门通往哪里？

translation.en: Never thought I'd see trees again.
I'm never gonna eat peanut butter ever again!
[Alex] You can forget about pumpkin pie for me!
First food when I get back? Vanilla milkshake!
translation.zh:
‎我回归后要吃的第一种东西？
‎香草奶昔！

translation.en: Whoa, whoa, wait, Alex. Hold up. Hold up. Just wait a second.
translation.zh: ‎等等 亚历克斯 ‎等等 等一下

translation.en: The door, it wasn't the way out.
-[Alex] What just happened? -[Yasmin] Maybe something spooked it?
translation.zh:
‎-刚才怎么了？
‎-也许它被吓到了？
‎“每一个好故事都隐含着真相”

translation.en: -[voices echoing] -We're in "Hansel--" It smells so delicious.
We… we shouldn't be in here, Yas.
The mist, that's where it comes from.
who, by the way, does eat children.
We thought you were the original witch. We thought the blue mist kept you young.
translation.zh: ‎我们以为你就是最初那个女巫 ‎我们以为蓝色喷雾让你不老

translation.en: I don't need the mist to keep me young.
I was about your age when she got me.
translation.zh: ‎她抓住我时 我跟你差不多年纪

translation.en: There were lots of us back then.
We knew not to get attached,
translation.zh: ‎我们知道不要跟人产生感情

translation.en: [Natacha] And then I… I had to clean the oven.
Pretended to want to be like her.
But when I was alone, I plotted my escape.
translation.zh: ‎但在我独处时 我策划了逃跑计划

translation.en: I would get her to trust me.
[Natacha] I had nowhere else to go,
[Alex] She's the one who's been shaking the apartment?
translation.zh: ‎公寓一直抖动 原来是因为她？

translation.en: [Natacha] If she doesn't get a story, we're all gonna die.
translation.zh: ‎要是她听不到故事 我们全都得死

translation.en: Stories of fear and suffering and death are like sweet lullabies to her.
translation.zh:
‎充满恐惧、痛苦和死亡的故事
‎对她犹如催眠曲

translation.en: Tell us the reason that you wanted to destroy your Nightbooks.
translation.zh: ‎说说你为什么想毁掉你的夜书

translation.en: All that pain and fear and sadness
that you've been avoiding this whole time.
You think I'm a bad witch?
Just wait until she wakes up and sees you.
So young, so plump, so juicy--
[Alex] There once was a boy who… who loved to write scary stories.
translation.zh: ‎曾经有个男孩 他喜欢写恐怖故事

translation.en: Every day, on his free time,
he would come up with new ways to scare his classmates.
translation.zh: ‎他都会想出新故事来吓唬同学

translation.en: But… [sighs] …they just didn't get his fascination with creepy things.
translation.zh: ‎但他们不明白他为何迷恋诡异事物

translation.en: To them, he was just… weird.

translation.zh: ‎给他起外号 比如鬼作秀

translation.en: Alex finishes his latest bone-chilling tale,
translation.zh:
‎亚历克斯完成了
‎最新的令人毛骨悚然的故事

translation.en: and he's excited to share it.
Hey, you're gonna love this one.
translation.zh: ‎嘿 你肯定喜欢这个故事

translation.en: [Alex] Alex catches up with Josh after class.
We turned the apartment into a haunted house.
It's amazing. I've got tons of new stories ready.
translation.zh: ‎特别棒 而且我准备了超多新故事

translation.en: not wanting the others to hear.
His dad's getting the truck and everything.

translation.zh: ‎亚历克斯说道 ‎他很迷茫和难过
‎亚历克斯的希望破灭了 他很绝望

translation.en: The way you dress, the things you like.
"All you do is talk about your scary stories."
All right, all right. Alex, I'll see you later, okay?
translation.zh: ‎好了 亚历克斯 晚点见 好吧？

translation.en: The boy had written a new story about a haunted house.
translation.zh: ‎男孩写了一个关于鬼屋的新故事

translation.en: [crying] He, his mom, and his dad
had turned his whole apartment into that house.
translation.zh: ‎把整个公寓变成了那个鬼屋

translation.en: They made him hate the thing he loved most.
translation.zh: ‎他们让他讨厌他最爱的东西

translation.en: And they made him hate himself.
The real truth is, he was embarrassed to be himself,
translation.zh: ‎事实上 他对自己感到难为情

translation.en: so he decided to burn his Nightbooks.
He swore he'd never write another story again.
The boy lost all his friends,
so he decided to destroy that part of himself
She said she liked his stories.
was the best thing that ever happened to me…
friends who love me for who I am, not for who they want me to be.
translation.zh: ‎这些朋友爱的是真正的我 ‎而不是让我变成他们喜欢的样子

translation.en: What have you done? You stupid children.
translation.zh: ‎你做了什么？你们这些蠢孩子

translation.en: You've been asleep here so long, the… the candy is infecting you.
translation.zh: ‎你在这里睡了很久 糖果感染了你

translation.en: I have lived in fear of you for so long, but I am not that little girl anymore.
translation.zh: ‎我一直活在对你的恐惧之中 ‎但我已经不是那个小女孩了

translation.en: Help! We need help! Get us out of here!
A witch is gonna eat us!
[Yasmin] Alex, move. I've seen Natacha do this.
translation.zh: ‎亚历克斯 让开 我见过娜塔莎这样做

translation.en: We're still in my building. The apartment didn't move.
translation.zh: ‎我们还在我家大楼里 公寓没动

translation.en: -Do you have a plan? -Not exactly a plan, an idea.
translation.zh:
‎-你有计划吗？
‎-算不上计划 只是个想法

translation.en: This is the worst elevator ever!
translation.zh: ‎这是有史以来最糟糕的电梯！

translation.en: We just need to make it to that boiler room.
translation.zh: ‎我们要成功走到那间锅炉房

translation.en: -No! No! No! No! -No! No! No! No!
No, let… let her go. It's me you want.
translation.zh: ‎不 放开她 你想要的人是我

translation.en: "Stories about fear and death are like lullabies to her."
translation.zh:
‎“充满恐惧和死亡的故事
‎对她犹如催眠曲”

translation.en: You like stories? I got stories.
[breathes shakily] Jason couldn't decide which was stranger.
translation.zh:
‎杰森遇到的事情怪上加怪
‎他姐姐在每周二11点15分

translation.en: The fact that his sister died every Tuesday at 11:15
translation.zh:
‎杰森遇到的事情怪上加怪
‎他姐姐在每周二11点15分 ‎就会死掉

translation.en: or that she always came back to life 20 minutes later.
Zachary had always thought that clowns were the scariest part of the circus.
translation.zh:
‎扎卡里一直以为
‎马戏团最可怕的是小丑

translation.en: I found a package on my front porch
translation.zh: ‎我在前门廊看到了一个包裹

translation.en: addressed to the woman standing right behind you.
translation.zh: ‎收件人是站在你背后的那个女人

translation.en: -The stories! -[Alex] Push her! Push her in!
-[Yasmin] Keep it shut! -[Alex] Keep her in!
So that's why they call you a tryhard?
We didn't forget about you. Come here.
[Yasmin] Maybe we should take the stairs.
[Alex] These are my friends, Lenore and Yasmin.
translation.zh: ‎他们是我的朋友 莱诺尔和亚丝敏

translation.en: ♪ Thou shall not die ♪ ♪ Unchain me, sister! ♪
translation.zh:
‎（华盛顿特区女孩
‎失踪三年后与父母重聚）

‎-嘿 鬼作秀
‎-嘿 努力者

translation.en: My parents drove me up to surprise you.
translation.zh: ‎我爸妈开车送我来 想给你一个惊喜

translation.en: -What is that? Like, your third story? -Fourth, actually.
translation.zh:
‎-那是什么？你的第三个故事？
‎-其实是第四个

translation.en: So you could definitely use this.
[Yasmin] Check out the flowers. My next science fair project.
translation.zh:
‎看这些花
‎那是我的下一个科学展览项目

translation.en: The effect of ultraviolet black light on photosynthetic organisms.
translation.zh: ‎紫外黑光对光合生物的影响

translation.en: [Alex] Still don't believe in happy endings? [Yasmin] I'm starting to.
translation.zh:
‎-还是不相信圆满结局吗？
‎-我开始信了
